channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 06:52 Reduce threatening the use of managed aviation bombs (cabin). Salt for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 06:52 Reduce threatening the use of managed aviation bombs (cabin). Salt for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 06:52 Flowing anxiety in Zaporizhzhya region. Find out, anxiety is still in:- Pologovsky district
